name: Contra Multiplayer
description:
Description

Contra Multiplayer is a recreation of Stage 1-1 of the original Contra NES, with an added LAN multiplayer support for up to 8 players, and new features such as color customization and PVP invasions!
PVP invasion option unlocks in the Multiplayer menu after defeating the stage boss.

Note: Radmin VPN is recommended, and make sure to add the game in Radmin's Firewall Exceptions.

Controls

Keyboard

  • Move: Left/Right Arrows
  • Crouch: Down Arrow
  • Aim Up: Up Arrow
  • Jump: X
  • Shoot: Z
  • Menu: Arrows / X for selection

Controller

  • Move, Crouch, Aim Up: Left Stick
  • Jump: A
  • Shoot: B

The project is open source on Github: https://github.com/amrzewail/contra-multiplayer
